name: sync-beeminder-tagged-time
description: Updates a Beeminder goal with hashtagged calendar entries

scripts.deploy: npm run build && claudia --profile claudia create --region eu-west-1 --handler sync-btt-lambda.handler --name sync-beeminder-time-tracking-music --role sync-beeminder-time-tracking-music-role --runtime nodejs8.10 --timeout 60 --set-env-from-json .env.json
scripts.redeploy: npm run build && claudia --profile claudia update --config claudia-music.json

author: Colin Z. Robertson
